mapper.sql: select no, house_no, user_no, content, score, blind_state, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date from house_comment
mapper.insert: insert into house_comment(no, house_no, user_no, content, score, blind_state, reg_date ) values(house_comment_seq.nextval, #{house_no}, #{user_no}, #{content}, #{score}, 'N', sysdate)
